main event: Seven round white objects were observed separately for two minutes each in the sky on June 6, 1956.
interesting points: The objects were seen at intervals of two minutes each time,The objects appeared very high in the sky and were the size of a dime at arm's length,Five B-47s were conducting a photo mission in the area during the sighting,The sighting was influenced by scattered high clouds, leading to the impression of more than five aircraft.
